physicalTable.name: SAMP_CUSTOMERS_SCD
physicalTable.description: Customers Dimension table: Stores customer dimension attribute information

physicalColumns.name: Status_Key
physicalColumns.description: Status Key: Stores customer status as text

physicalColumns.name: Crdt_Rate
physicalColumns.description: Credit Rate: Stores customer credit rate information as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Address_Key
physicalColumns.description: Address Key: Joins to Address_Key of Addresses dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Name
physicalColumns.description: Name: Stores the customer name in text

physicalColumns.name: Income_Lvl
physicalColumns.description: Income level: Stores the information in text

physicalColumns.name: Type_Key
physicalColumns.description: Type Key: Stores the information as text

physicalColumns.name: Cust_Key
physicalColumns.description: Cust Key: Surrogate key of the customer dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Fst_Contact_Dt
physicalColumns.description: First Contact Date: Stores the information in date format

physicalColumns.name: Marital_St
physicalColumns.description: Marital Status: Stores the information in text

physicalColumns.name: Segment_Key
physicalColumns.description: Segment Key: Joins to segment_key in customer segments dimension table

physicalColumns.name: Num_Attribute
physicalColumns.description: Credit Rate: Stores customer credit rate information as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Birth_Dt
physicalColumns.description: Birth Date: Stores the information in date format

physicalColumns.name: Lst_Order_Dt
physicalColumns.description: Last Order Date: Stores the information in date format

physicalColumns.name: Gender
physicalColumns.description: Income level: Stores the information in text
